slides.title: About Delhi
slides.content:
**Official Name:** National Capital Territory of Delhi
**Status:** Union Territory with legislature
**Chief Minister:** Elected head of government
**Lieutenant Governor:** Administrator appointed by President
**Area:** 1,484 kmÂ²
**Population:** ~2 crore (approx.)
**Districts:** 11
**Languages:** Hindi, English, Punjabi, Urdu
**Major Monuments:** Red Fort, Qutub Minar, India Gate, Lotus Temple

question.questionText: How many districts are there in Delhi?
question.explanation: Delhi has 11 districts as of current administrative division
